Package com.amplitude.experiment

Class DefaultExperimentClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplitude.experiment.DefaultExperimentClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExperimentClient
    public class DefaultExperimentClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExperimentClient
    Default ExperimentClient implementation. Use the Experiment class to initialize and access instances.

        @NotNull
public Variant getVariant​(@NotNull
                          java.lang.String flagKey)

      • setContextProvider

        @NotNull
public ExperimentClient setContextProvider​(@Nullable
                                           ContextProvider provider)
        Description copied from interface: ExperimentClient
        Sets an identity provider that enriches the ExperimentUser with a user_id and device_id when fetching flags. The enrichment happens at the time a new network request is made. This is used to connect Experiment to Amplitude identities. See ContextProvider.
        Specified by:
        setContextProvider in interface ExperimentClient
